description: OpenAI Text Generator Tool that generates text using OpenAI's API based on a provided prompt.

prompt.description: The input prompt for which the text will be generated. This parameter is required.

apiKey.description: The OpenAI API key. It can be provided as a parameter or set as an environment variable. This parameter is required if the environment variable is not set.

model.description: The model to be used for text generation. Defaults to 'gpt-3.5-turbo' if not provided.

systemPrompt.description: The system prompt that sets the behavior of the assistant. Defaults to 'You are a helpful assistant.' if not provided.

temperature.description: Controls the randomness of the output. A higher value (up to 1) makes the output more random, while a lower value makes it more deterministic. Defaults to 0.7 if not provided.

maxTokens.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate in the response. Defaults to 500 if not provided.
